$env

server-specific environment object

This file should be copied to each MPage server and then cusomized tot hat environment

Summary
Properties
purposeUse for environment specific switching, such as debug code.
appendDevAppends “_dev” to ccl callbacks
baseUrlBase URL for the directory containing these MPages.
serviceUrlBase datasource URL when not running inside of powerchart.
serviceSupportsDirectIndicates that the serviceUrl will properly handle a call to ccl_direct
mpageTypeDefault type of mpage environment available

Properties

purpose

Use for environment specific switching, such as debug code.

Examples

  • DEV
  • CERT
  • BUILD
  • PROD Usage:
function debug(value){
    if ($env.purpose == "DEV"){
        debug_window(value)
    }
}

See Also:

  • appendDev

appendDev

Appends “_dev” to ccl callbacks

if this is true and the purpose id “DEV” then “_dev” will be appended to any CCL names in callbacks.  This allows for separation of dev CCL code in the same domain as testing or production code.

baseUrl

Base URL for the directory containing these MPages.

This is useful for Constructing URL’s inside your MPages

serviceUrl

Base datasource URL when not running inside of powerchart.

This is used by callback functions when XMLCclRequest is not available.  A normal XMLHttpRequest is made using this url, with the ccl name inserted in place of {ccl} and the comma separated list of parameters inserted in place of {params}.

This could point to static data files, and MPage Service instance, or an arbitrary application server like PHP or ASP

Examples

// MPage web service
serviceUrl:"https://example.com/discern/mpages/reports/{ccl}?parameters={params}"

// static datafiles relative to the current page
serviceUrl:"data/{ccl}.json"

// a web app that dynamically generates test data
serviceUrl:"https://myhost.com/datagen/index.cfm?ccl={ccl}&params={params}"

serviceSupportsDirect

Indicates that the serviceUrl will properly handle a call to ccl_direct

Set this to true if you are using the PCRemoting provider, have the ccl_direct prg installed in your domain, and your serviceUrl is either the mpage service URL or a proxy.  This allows Ext.Direct to work properly over the MPage service

When false, Direct calls made via the serviceUrl will be broken up into individual calls, which is appropriate when using static files for serviceUrls.

mpageType

Default type of mpage environment available

Should be one of these values

externalNot running in PowerChart or Discern Viewer.  $env.serviceUrl will be used for callbacks and special functions like applink are not available encounter id are not
orgRunning in powerchart at the organizer level.  Special functions like applink are available as is user_id but patient id and encounter id are not
chartRunning in powerchart at the organizer level.  Special functions like applink are available as is user_id, patient id and encounter id

This can be overridden by passing env_mpagetype=<value> in the URL.  The mpages_jslib file will detect this and override $env and set a cookie so that all pages launched from this page will also be aware of the mpage type
